channel.title: Scamming; Right or Wrong?
channel.description: I just need to vent, so here it goes. So today I was selling gold that I've made. 60M total for 50$ to pay off some bills for my car. I added a trusted guy off of Sythe and proceeded to trade with him. I have it all videoed. I've added a scam report and nothing has happened nor will it do anything for me, so I'm out 60M. It just really pisses me off that people can do this. Now I have to go take out a loan to pay my insurance. So now I ask this question, is Scamming other people right or wrong, and has this ever happened to you?

item.title: Scamming; Right or Wrong?
item.dc:creator: @Enigma1 Enigma_
item.description:
@Enigma1 wrote:

At the moment, gold is worth about $0.75 per mil, if you’re going by powerbot’s market.

Read full topic

item.title: Scamming; Right or Wrong?
item.dc:creator: @costanator24 costanator24
item.description:
@costanator24 wrote:

i got scammed once when i was like 13 so like 6 years ago i lost a rune kiteshild. the funny thing is back then i almost quit playing cuz of it haha. but i agree that scamming players who dont know how to protect themself from this is wrong. and that the assholes who set out to do this should die in the flames of mordor!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:

[quote=“Stupit, post:59, topic:394398”][quote author=P A N I C link=topic=491584.msg3600116#msg3600116 date=1305484127]
Kind of a stupid question.
Scamming:
Stealing other peoples hard earned GP, sometimes millions. Sure, you’re making money but they loose it all. BTW Karma is a bitch.
[/quote]
Karma? Really, what the fuck have I done to you.[/quote]
He wasnt talking to you, but the topic title.

item.title: Scamming; Right or Wrong?
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:45, topic:394398”]Online, you can’t trust anyone, unless they have nothing to gain or lose. The sooner you learn and live by that rule, the better.

That is why we don’t and will never have a ‘black market’ or similar to that here.[/quote]

I can now see where having a market on here would cause insane problems.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

This is why I generally stay away from real-world trading of any kind. Far too risky and its really not worth it considering its only a game.

Read full topic

item.title: Scamming; Right or Wrong?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Online, you can’t trust anyone, unless they have nothing to gain or lose. The sooner you learn and live by that rule, the better.

That is why we don’t and will never have a ‘black market’ or similar to that here.

Read full topic

item.title: Scamming; Right or Wrong?
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:43, topic:394398”][quote author=casey. link=topic=491584.msg3596644#msg3596644 date=1305157972]

Yes, plenty of ‘middle men’ on sythe.org have scammed lots of money, get banned, and start over just like any other scammer.

I have to disagree with you. I’ve trusted Middle Men on Sythe with thousands of dollars.

Most of the verified one’s are veterans of sythe and generally trustworthy.
[/quote]
That is the problem, the middlemen are verified and trustworthy veterans of sythe that complete many transactions successfully, until they decide they want to quit or feel like scamming, steal thousands of dollars, get banned, then join under another name and start over. I’ve seen it happen many, many times over the years, and if you have been on sythe.org that long as well, so have you.[/quote]
I’ve never used sythe.org because I hear lots of problems about it, but that sounds pretty interesting. When they are going to quit being a MM they just scam thousands, why not.
-I just went on sythe and liked how one of their biggest boards was the dispute forum. Sucks you can barelly trust anyone.

Read full topic

item.title: Scamming; Right or Wrong?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:38, topic:394398”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=491584.msg3596510#msg3596510 date=1305147528]
Yes, plenty of ‘middle men’ on sythe.org have scammed lots of money, get banned, and start over just like any other scammer.
[/quote]
I have to disagree with you. I’ve trusted Middle Men on Sythe with thousands of dollars.

Most of the verified one’s are veterans of sythe and generally trustworthy.[/quote]
That is the problem, the middlemen are verified and trustworthy veterans of sythe that complete many transactions successfully, until they decide they want to quit or feel like scamming, steal thousands of dollars, get banned, then join under another name and start over. I’ve seen it happen many, many times over the years, and if you have been on sythe.org that long as well, so have you.

Read full topic

item.title: Scamming; Right or Wrong?
item.dc:creator: @Your_Master Your Master
item.description:
@Your_Master wrote:

The money I lost is when I bought accounts the owners simply recovered the account back or when I buy gold i go first in increments. Example: If I want to buy 100mil in increments it would be; I pay the price for 25mil, he gives me 25mil and repeating that untill the amount I wanted is done.

Read full topic
